title: Add a new flag allow-top-navigation-with-gesture
body: An already established standard (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/browsers.html#attr-iframe-sandbox-allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation), this new flag requires top-level browsing context navigation from a sandboxed iframe only through gesture. This prevents malicious auto-redirection from 3rd party content while still allowing top-level navigation
